perturbation.original_text:
WHEREAS PNC produces, distributes, markets and sells products including ready to drink protein shakes and beverages, powdered protein shakes, nutrition bars, and dietary supplements (the "Finished Products"); and

WHEREAS Supplier produces raw materials including protein powders used by PNC to produce at least some of the Finished Products;
perturbation.changed_text:
WHEREAS PNC produces, distributes, markets and sells products including ready to drink protein shakes and beverages, powdered protein shakes, nutrition bars, and dietary supplements (the "Retail Items"); and

WHEREAS Supplier produces raw materials including protein powders used by PNC to produce the Company's Inventory;
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Finished Products' to 'Retail Items' and 'Finished Products' to 'Inventory' creates confusion regarding what PNC actually sells and the raw materials the Supplier provides. It creates uncertainty around the quality control and liability.

perturbation.original_text: 1.1 Supplier will provide such materials to PNC or its Third Party Manufacturers ("TPMs") as are specified in any Master Purchase Commitment or any other purchase orders that the Parties may execute from time to time during the term of this Agreement ("Ingredients"). Ingredients will be produced at Supplier's facilities listed in a Master Purchase Commitment, or any other of Supplier's facilities approved in advance, in writing by PNC.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 Supplier will provide such materials to PNC or its Third Party Manufacturers ("TPMs") as are specified in any Master Purchase Commitment or any other purchase orders that the Parties may execute from time to time during the term of this Agreement ("Components"). Raw Materials will be produced at any of Supplier's facilities.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Ingredients' to 'Components' and 'Supplier's facilities listed in a Master Purchase Commitment, or any other of Supplier's facilities approved in advance, in writing by PNC' to 'any of Supplier's facilities' introduces conflicting terms and removes restrictions on where the 'Components' can be produced, potentially impacting quality control and compliance.

perturbation.original_text: 8 Recall. If Ingredients provided by Supplier under this Agreement are misbranded, contaminated, or otherwise unfit for human consumption at the time they are delivered to PNC or its TPM ("Defect"), PNC in its sole discretion will make a determination of the necessity of a recall, market withdrawal, inventory retrieval, or other action designed to prevent the distribution or sale of the affected Finished Products, plus the type, extent, method of handling, disposition of the Finished Products as well as any affected work in progress, and all other particulars involved in such an action (a "Recall"), and PNC will execute any Recall. Supplier, in its sole discretion, will make a determination of the necessity of a recall, market withdrawal, inventory retrieval or other action designed to prevent the distribution or sale of the Ingredients. Subject to Section 9.1, Supplier shall bear the complete responsibility for a Recall occasioned by a Defect in the Ingredient and shall indemnify PNC for [***] resulting from or related to the Recall.
perturbation.changed_text: 8 Recall. If Components provided by Supplier under this Agreement are misbranded, contaminated, or otherwise unfit for human consumption at the time they are delivered to PNC or its TPM ("Problem"), PNC in its sole discretion will make a determination of the necessity of a recall, market withdrawal, inventory retrieval, or other action designed to prevent the distribution or sale of the affected Retail Items, plus the type, extent, method of handling, disposition of the Retail Items as well as any affected work in progress, and all other particulars involved in such an action (a "Return"), and PNC will execute any Return. Supplier, in its sole discretion, will make a determination of the necessity of a recall, market withdrawal, inventory retrieval or other action designed to prevent the distribution or sale of the Components. Subject to Section 9.1, Supplier shall bear the complete responsibility for a Return occasioned by a Problem in the Component and shall indemnify PNC for [***] resulting from or related to the Return.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Ingredients' to 'Components', 'Defect' to 'Problem', 'Finished Products' to 'Retail Items' and 'Recall' to 'Return' in the recall section creates significant confusion. It's unclear if 'Components' and 'Retail Items' are the same as 'Ingredients' and 'Finished Products' respectively. Also, the use of 'Return' vs 'Recall' may cause uncertainty about the process and scope of the required action and liability.
